data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Yokohama Marinos is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Yudai Yamamoto signals a Cerezo throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
Yokohama Marinos drive forward but Junior Santos is judged offside.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Erik of Yokohama Marinos is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 8, Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Goal! Cerezo take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Hiroaki Okuno.
In the minute 10, Tatsuhiro Sakamoto with an assist there.
Can Cerezo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Cerezo pushes forward through Tatsuhiro Sakamoto, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jin Hyeon Kim for Cerezo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Jin Hyeon Kim for Cerezo is back on the field again.
In the minute 19, Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Yudai Yamamoto has awarded Cerezo a corner.
Hiroaki Okuno (Cerezo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 24, Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Osaka a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Junior Santos (Yokohama Marinos) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 29, Yudai Yamamoto awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Throw-in for Cerezo in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 32, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Yusuke Maruhashi of Cerezo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 38, Yokohama Marinos drive upfield and Junior Santos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Cerezo defender.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos's Takuya Kida gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 38, Yudai Yamamoto awards Cerezo a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Marcos Junior hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 39, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo.
In the minute 44, In Osaka Yokohama Marinos's Erik is caught offside.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Free kick for Cerezo in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 45, Ayumu Seko for the home team is judged to be offside.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Cerezo territory.
Can Cerezo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half is now underway.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Cerezo.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Cerezo in their own half.
Ken Matsubara for Yokohama Marinos gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Yokohama Marinos.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Cerezo's half.
In the minute 51, Cerezo to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Cerezo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In the minute 54, Takuya Kida (Yokohama Marinos) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cerezo's half?
Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Free kick Yokohama Marinos.
Theerathon Bunmathan (Yokohama Marinos) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 58, Yudai Yamamoto awards Cerezo a goal kick.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Cerezo have a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos's Junior Santos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cerezo defender.
Ball goes out of play for a Cerezo goal kick.
In the minute 64, Throw-in Cerezo.
Tatsuhiro Sakamoto (Cerezo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 65, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Miguel Angel Lotina is making the team's first substitution at Yanmar Stadium Nagai with Naoyuki Fujita replacing Yasuki Kimoto.
Miguel Angel Lotina (Cerezo) is making a second substitution, with Yuta Toyokawa replacing Bruno Pereira Mendes.
In the minute 67, Cerezo take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Hiroaki Okuno.
That's a fine assist from Hiroshi Kiyotake.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Cerezo in their own half.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In the minute 70, Kota Mizunuma is replacing Junior Santos for Yokohama Marinos at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Goal! Yuta Toyokawa extends Cerezo's lead to 3-0.
In the minute 71, Great play from Eiichi Katayama to set up the goal.
Edigar Junio is replacing Marcos Junior for the away team.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Cerezo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yokohama Marinos make their third substitution with Jun Amano replacing Daizen Maeda.
Throw-in for Cerezo in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
The away team have replaced Takahiro Ogihara with Ado Onaiwu. This is the fourth substitution made today by Ange Postecoglou.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos drives forward and Ado Onaiwu gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 78, Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Tatsuhiro Sakamoto (Cerezo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 81, Goal! Yuta Toyokawa extends Cerezo's lead to 4-0.
Hiroaki Okuno instrumental with a fine assist.
Yokohama Marinos push forward at Yanmar Stadium Nagai and Edigar Junio gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cerezo defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Osaka.
In the minute 83, Miguel Angel Lotina (Cerezo) is making a third substitution, with Jun Nishikawa replacing Hiroshi Kiyotake.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Cerezo throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Cerezo have a goal kick.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Cerezo a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Toshiyuki Takagi is replacing Hiroaki Okuno for Cerezo at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Corner awarded to Cerezo.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
In the minute 88, Cerezo's Yuta Toyokawa has been booked in Osaka.
Cerezo have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Cerezo are pushing forward but Tatsuhiro Sakamoto's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Cerezo a goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Toshiyuki Takagi hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Cerezo in Osaka.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Yanmar Stadium Nagai. The final score is 4-1.
Kota Mizunuma (Yokohama Marinos) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 4-1 at Yanmar Stadium Nagai.
Erik with an assist there.
